title: Print, "Rain in May (Samidare), No. 47", ca. 1910
markings: In graphite, lower left: Rain in May
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower left: [Japanese characters] / no. 47 / Samidare
description: A large white iris, outer perianth leaves with rays of light violet tints.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Rain in May (Samidare), No. 47", ca. 1910.
ca. 1910. 40.8 x 27.8 cm (16 1/16 x 10 15/16 in.). Gift of Mary Rutherford Jay. 1948-134-99.
